long.ar:
Web Paint Tool is absolutely free lightweight digital program to created various drawing that comes loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. 

Simple, easy and fun to use paint tool app, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this chrome extension. Web paint something is user friendly and you could get started painting in a second. If you’d like to learn how to paint, Paint something might be the best thing that happened to you. You can choose custom colors and different line sizes!! 

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy to use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser and others tool) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use.

Paint online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. Fully customized screenshot that could be printed, saved or sent instantly. 

It contains the tools you need: 
 - Pencil tool - draw custom lines
 - Text tool - add annotation
 - Emoji - add fine emoji on any web pages
 - Bucket fill tool - fill shapes and drawn with any color from palette
 - Line tool - put start and end point to paint straight line
 - Quadratic curve - draw a quadratic curve with the selected line width
 - Bezier curve - paint a bezier curve with the selected line width
 - Polygon tool - paint a polygon with the selected line width
 - Ellipse tool - draw an ellipse or a circle with the selected line width
 - Eyedropper tool - pick a color from the web page or your drawings
 - Screenshot tool - screenshot maker allows saving result in PN or JPG

All tools as in MS Paint but only in your browser. 

You can mark shapes with the magic marker, write with the text tool and more. After you are done. Take screenshot of your work so that your friends can see your creativity as well. You can share your images on Pinterest board.

Want to share your screen for cases like reporting technical issues, making product demos or how-to tutorials?  Here are reasons to choose Paint and Screenshot Tool:

- Hot-keys to each tool
- Current drawings are automatically saved
- Save drawing with a Screenshot option ( take a screenshot of a full page or capture selected area.) Screen capture.
- Download image to your PC or Print 
- Crop the necessary area of an image and save it

Annotate on any webpage and save it as a screenshot! Annotate the Web was created to allow users to annotate any webpage and save it as an image. Page Marker for Chrome

Important
After installation / update Paint Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.

Paint on web and Screenshot Tool in simple manner and without any difficulties. Draw online with our new and absolutely free extension for chrome browser.

With Page Marker, you can use your mouse or touchscreen to draw on the web or on PDFs and save it to your computer. Paint, draw, and mark on any webpage or website. It is just a fun Web paint extension, and you can get some laughs using this extension by creating funny faces, etc., on web pages.

Also it best tool for working with PDF files - PDF Office is a PDF Editor online from which you can perform editing operations over PDF files but using your web browser. 

Known as a web paint or paint online tool extension is a useful have for students, teammates and everyone who works with websites content, as you could easily learn or save information, create custom tutorials or paper notes, if you’d decided to print it.

Please rate our Paint Tool extension if you like it. Happy painting everyone.






Web Paint  is one of the best fun painting and drawing app for youfor Chrome ! 

Draw beautiful drawings and unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool  is absolutely lite weight and completely free extension  which can be used for educational purpose and introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.


This app has a simple and easy to use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single screen and one click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on app icon, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks required to actually start working on the app.

Key Features of Application

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures and paintings with over 20 colours.
- This App offers you a white background for you to start fresh drawing on.
- Using Paint you can Save and Share the picture through social media.
- Web Paint offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Paint Pro is a lightweight paint app which hardly takes any space on your device.
- Paint works on both phones and Tablets.
- Best suited for phones having a screen size greater than or equal to 4 inches.


You can share your images on Pinterest board.


It also contains the functions you need: 
- Hot-keys to each tool
- Save drawing with a screenshot option
- Save image to your PC or Print 
- Crop the necessary area of an image and save it

This extension is awesome, I recommend it for anyone who has ever wanted to make notes on the page temporarily.

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Notre extension d'outil de peinture a une conception simple et facile à utiliser. Il n'y a pas de confusion et des icônes d'outils facilement reconnaissables (crayon, pot de peinture, gomme et autres outils) sont utilisées dans l'application, ce qui facilite l'utilisation par tout le monde.

Peignez en ligne ou ajoutez des informations sur une page Web pour mettre en évidence des moments, puis prenez une capture d'écran d'une page Web complète ou simplement d'une zone sélectionnée avec une option pour la télécharger ou la partager. Capture d'écran entièrement personnalisée pouvant être imprimée, enregistrée ou envoyée instantanément.

Il contient les outils dont vous avez besoin :
  - Outil Crayon - dessinez des lignes personnalisées
  - Outil Texte - ajouter une annotation
  - Emoji - ajoutez de beaux emoji sur toutes les pages Web
  - Outil de remplissage de seau - remplissez les formes et dessinez avec n'importe quelle couleur de la palette
  - Outil Ligne - placez le point de départ et d'arrivée pour peindre une ligne droite
  - Courbe quadratique - dessine une courbe quadratique avec la largeur de ligne sélectionnée
  - Courbe de Bézier - peindre une courbe de Bézier avec la largeur de ligne sélectionnée
  - Outil Polygone - peignez un polygone avec la largeur de ligne sélectionnée
  - Outil Ellipse - dessine une ellipse ou un cercle avec la largeur de ligne sélectionnée
  - Outil Pipette - choisissez une couleur de la page Web ou de vos dessins
  - Outil de capture d'écran - le créateur de capture d'écran permet d'enregistrer le résultat au format PN ou JPG

Tous les outils comme dans MS Paint mais uniquement dans votre navigateur. Peindre sur le web

Vous pouvez marquer des formes avec le marqueur magique, écrire avec l'outil texte et plus encore. Une fois que vous avez terminé. Prenez une capture d'écran de votre travail afin que vos amis puissent également voir votre créativité. Vous pouvez partager vos images sur le tableau Pinterest.

Vous souhaitez partager votre écran pour des cas tels que le signalement de problèmes techniques, la réalisation de démonstrations de produits ou de didacticiels ? Voici les raisons de choisir l'outil de peinture et de capture d'écran :

- Touches de raccourci pour chaque outil
- Les dessins actuels sont automatiquement enregistrés
- Enregistrer le dessin avec une option de capture d'écran (prenez une capture d'écran d'une page entière ou capturez la zone sélectionnée.) Capture d'écran.
- Télécharger l'image sur votre PC ou imprimer
- Recadrez la zone nécessaire d'une image et enregistrez-la

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

Paint on web is a fun extension on Google Chrome which lets you annotate any page you want and share it with your friends. How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

alat za crtanje potpuno je besplatan, lagani digitalni program za stvaranje različitih crteža koji dolaze s četkama, fontovima, oblicima i drugim resursima.

Jednostavna, laka i zabavna aplikacija za crtanje, možete uživati ​​i učiti crtati na ovom kromiranom proširenju. Web paint something je jednostavan za korištenje i mogli biste početi slikati u sekundi. Ako želite naučiti slikati, Slikaj nešto bi mogla biti najbolja stvar koja vam se dogodila. Možete odabrati prilagođene boje i različite veličine linija!!

Naš nastavak alata za bojanje ima jednostavan dizajn koji se lako koristi. Nije zbunjujuće i lako prepoznatljive ikone alata (olovka, kanta za boju, gumica i drugi alati) koriste se u aplikaciji što svima olakšava korištenje.

Slikajte online ili dodajte informacije na web stranicu kako biste istaknuli trenutke, a zatim napravite snimku zaslona cijele web stranice ili samo odabranog područja s opcijom preuzimanja ili dijeljenja. Potpuno prilagođena snimka zaslona koja se može ispisati, spremiti ili odmah poslati.

Sadrži alate koji su vam potrebni:
  - Alat za olovku - crtajte prilagođene linije
  - Alat za tekst - dodajte komentar
  - Emoji - dodajte fine emotikone na bilo koju web stranicu
  - Bucket fill tool - ispunite oblike i nacrtajte ih bilo kojom bojom iz palete
  - Alat za linije - stavite početnu i krajnju točku za crtanje ravne linije
  - Kvadratna krivulja - nacrtajte kvadratnu krivulju s odabranom širinom linije
  - Bezierova krivulja - obojite Bezierovu krivulju s odabranom širinom linije
  - Alat za poligon - obojite poligon s odabranom širinom linije
  - Ellipse tool - nacrtajte elipsu ili krug s odabranom širinom linije
  - Alat za kapaljku - odaberite boju s web stranice ili svojih crteža
  - Alat za snimke zaslona - alat za izradu snimaka zaslona omogućuje spremanje rezultata u PN ili JPG

Svi alati kao u MS Paintu, ali samo u vašem pregledniku. Slikaj na webu

Možete označavati oblike čarobnim markerom, pisati alatom za tekst i više. Nakon što završite. Napravite screenshot svog rada kako bi i vaši prijatelji mogli vidjeti vašu kreativnost. Svoje slike možete dijeliti na Pinterest ploči.

Želite li podijeliti svoj zaslon za slučajeve kao što su prijava tehničkih problema, izrada demonstracija proizvoda ili vodiča s uputama? Evo razloga zašto odabrati alat za slikanje i snimanje zaslona:

- Hot tipke za svaki alat
- Trenutni crteži se automatski spremaju
- Spremite crtež s opcijom snimanja zaslona (napravite snimak zaslona cijele stranice ili snimite odabrano područje.) Snimanje zaslona.
- Preuzmite sliku na svoje računalo ili ispišite
- Izrežite potrebno područje slike i spremite ga

Obilježite bilo koju web stranicu i spremite je kao snimak zaslona! Annotate the Web stvoren je kako bi korisnicima omogućio da označe bilo koju web stranicu i spreme je kao sliku. oznaka stranice za Chrome

Paint tool è un programma digitale leggero assolutamente gratuito per creare vari disegni che vengono caricati con pennelli, caratteri, forme e altre risorse.

App semplice, facile e divertente da usare per lo strumento di disegno, puoi divertirti e imparare a disegnare su questa estensione di Chrome. Web paint qualcosa è facile da usare e potresti iniziare a dipingere in un secondo. Se vuoi imparare a dipingere, Dipingi qualcosa potrebbe essere la cosa migliore che ti sia capitata. Puoi scegliere colori personalizzati e diverse misure di linea!!

La nostra estensione dello strumento di pittura ha un design semplice e facile da usare. Non crea confusione e nell'app vengono utilizzate icone degli strumenti facilmente riconoscibili (matita, secchio di vernice, gomma e altri strumenti) che ne facilitano l'utilizzo da parte di tutti.

Dipingi online o aggiungi informazioni su una pagina Web per evidenziare i momenti, quindi acquisisci uno screenshot di un'intera pagina Web o solo di un'area selezionata con un'opzione per scaricarla o condividerla. Schermata completamente personalizzata che può essere stampata, salvata o inviata istantaneamente.

Contiene gli strumenti di cui hai bisogno:
  - Strumento matita: disegna linee personalizzate

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

paint tool je popolnoma brezplačen lahek digitalni program za ustvarjanje različnih risb, ki so naložene s čopiči, pisavami, oblikami in drugimi viri.

Enostavna, enostavna in zabavna aplikacija za orodje za slikanje, lahko uživate in se učite risati na tej kromirani razširitvi. Web paint something je uporabniku prijazen in lahko začnete slikati v trenutku. Če bi se radi naučili slikati, je slika Paint something najboljša stvar, ki se vam je zgodila. Izberete lahko barve po meri in različne velikosti črt!!

Naš podaljšek orodja za barvanje ima preprosto in enostavno za uporabo zasnovo. Ne povzroča zmede in v aplikaciji so uporabljene zlahka prepoznavne ikone orodij (svinčnik, vedro za barvo, radirka in drugo orodje), kar olajša uporabo vsem.

Slikajte v spletu ali dodajte informacije na spletno stran, da poudarite trenutke, nato naredite posnetek zaslona celotne spletne strani ali samo izbranega območja z možnostjo prenosa ali skupne rabe. Popolnoma prilagojen posnetek zaslona, ​​ki ga je mogoče natisniti, shraniti ali poslati takoj.

Vsebuje orodja, ki jih potrebujete:
  - Orodje za svinčnik - narišite črte po meri
  - Orodje za besedilo - dodajte opombo
  - Emoji - dodajte fine emoji na katero koli spletno stran
  - Orodje za polnjenje vedra - zapolnite oblike in narišite s katero koli barvo iz palete
  - Orodje za črte - postavite začetno in končno točko za slikanje ravne črte
  - Kvadratna krivulja - narišite kvadratno krivuljo z izbrano širino črte
  - Bezierjeva krivulja - pobarvajte Bezierjevo krivuljo z izbrano širino črte
  - Orodje za poligon - pobarvajte poligon z izbrano širino črte
  - Orodje za elipso - narišite elipso ali krog z izbrano širino črte

  - Orodje za posnetke zaslona - izdelovalec posnetkov zaslona omogoča shranjevanje rezultatov v PN ali JPG

Oblike lahko označite s čarobnim markerjem, pišete z orodjem za besedilo in še več. Ko končate. Naredite posnetek zaslona svojega dela, da bodo tudi vaši prijatelji videli vašo ustvarjalnost. Svoje slike lahko delite na plošči Pinterest.

Želite deliti svoj zaslon za primere, kot je poročanje o tehničnih težavah, izdelava predstavitev izdelkov ali vadnice z navodili? Tu so razlogi za izbiro orodja za slikanje in posnetek zaslona:

- Vroče tipke za vsako orodje
- Trenutne risbe se samodejno shranijo
- Shranite risbo z možnostjo posnetka zaslona (posnemite posnetek zaslona celotne strani ali zajemite izbrano območje.) Zajem zaslona.
- Prenesite sliko na svoj računalnik ali natisnite
- Obrežite potrebno območje slike in ga shranite

Dodajte opombe na katero koli spletno stran in jih shranite kot posnetek zaslona! Funkcija Annotate the Web je bila ustvarjena, da uporabnikom omogoči označevanje katere koli spletne strani in njeno shranjevanje kot sliko. označevalec strani za Chrome

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download a

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

What is a Screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use Screenshot?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshot can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshot Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

-Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
-Showcasing software for a review.
-Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
-Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
-Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

How to Take Screenshot

You don't need special software to take a picture of the screen because screenshot functionality is built into all current operating systems. Some devices even capture specific portions of the screen.

Screen Capture Programs

Many graphics programs, also have built-in screen-capture capabilities. Dedicated screen capture software might offer several benefits:

Automatically name and save screenshots to a specific folder.

Auto-scroll functions to capture long documents like web pages that don't fit on the screen.

Timed Screen capture to add a delay while you prepare the workspace before capturing.

Markup tools that add callouts, arrows, shapes, and text annotations to screenshots.

Options to include or exclude the mouse cursor.
There is screen recording software available that captures all of the activity on a computer monitor and turns it into a video file.

long.tr:
paint aracı, fırçalar, yazı tipleri, şekiller ve diğer kaynaklarla yüklü olarak gelen çeşitli çizimleri oluşturmak için tamamen ücretsiz, hafif bir dijital programdır.

Boyama aracı uygulamasını kullanmak için basit, kolay ve eğlenceli, bu krom uzantısında çizim yapmanın keyfini çıkarabilir ve öğrenebilirsiniz. Web boyama bir şey kullanıcı dostudur ve bir saniyede boyamaya başlayabilirsiniz. Resim yapmayı öğrenmek istiyorsanız, bir şeyi boyamak başınıza gelen en iyi şey olabilir. Özel renkler ve farklı çizgi boyutları seçebilirsiniz!!

Boya aracı uzantımız basit ve kullanımı kolay bir tasarıma sahiptir. Uygulamada kafa karıştırıcı değildir ve kolayca tanınabilir araç simgeleri (kalem, boya kovası, silgi ve diğer araçlar) kullanılmaktadır, bu da herkesin kullanımını kolaylaştırır.

Anları vurgulamak için çevrimiçi boyama yapın veya bir web sayfasına bilgi ekleyin, ardından indirme veya paylaşma seçeneğiyle tam bir web sayfasının veya yalnızca seçili bir alanın ekran görüntüsünü alın. Basılabilen, kaydedilebilen veya anında gönderilebilen tamamen özelleştirilmiş ekran görüntüsü.

İhtiyacınız olan araçları içerir:
  - Kalem aracı - özel çizgiler çizin
  - Metin aracı - ek açıklama ekleyin
  - Emoji - herhangi bir web sayfasına güzel emoji ekleyin
  - Kova doldurma aracı - şekilleri doldurun ve paletten herhangi bir renkle çizin
  - Çizgi aracı - düz bir çizgi çizmek için başlangıç ​​ve bitiş noktası koyun
  - İkinci dereceden eğri - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle ikinci dereceden bir eğri çizin
  - Bezier eğrisi - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir bezier eğrisi çizin
  - Çokgen aracı - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir çokgen çizin
  - Elips aracı - seçilen çizgi genişliğiyle bir elips veya daire çizin
  - Damlalık aracı - web sayfasından veya çizimlerinizden bir renk seçin
  - Ekran görüntüsü aracı - ekran görüntüsü oluşturucu, sonucu PN veya JPG olarak kaydetmeye izin verir

Tüm araçlar MS Paint'teki gibidir, ancak yalnızca tarayıcınızda. web üzerinde boya

Sihirli işaretleyici ile şekilleri işaretleyebilir, metin aracıyla yazabilir ve daha fazlasını yapabilirsiniz. İşiniz bittikten sonra. Arkadaşlarınızın da yaratıcılığınızı görebilmesi için çalışmanızın ekran görüntüsünü alın. Resimlerinizi Pinterest panosunda paylaşabilirsiniz.

Teknik sorunları bildirmek, ürün demoları yapmak veya nasıl yapılır eğitimleri gibi durumlar için ekranınızı paylaşmak ister misiniz? İşte boyama ve ekran görüntüsü alma aracını seçmeniz için nedenler:

- Her araç için kısayol tuşları
- Mevcut çizimler otomatik olarak kaydedilir
- Bir Ekran Görüntüsü seçeneğiyle çizimi kaydedin (tam sayfanın ekran görüntüsünü alın veya seçilen alanı yakalayın.) Ekran yakalama.
- Görüntüyü PC'nize indirin veya Yazdırın
- Bir görüntünün gerekli alanını kırpın ve kaydedin

Herhangi bir web sayfasına açıklama ekleyin ve ekran görüntüsü olarak kaydedin! Annotate the Web, kullanıcıların herhangi bir web sayfasına açıklama eklemesine ve onu bir resim olarak kaydetmesine izin vermek için oluşturuldu. Chrome için sayfa işaretleyici

Önemli
Paint Tool'u yükledikten/güncelledikten sonra, uzantının çalışması için lütfen tarayıcınızdaki etkin sekmeleri yeniden yükleyin.

Web ve Ekran Görüntüsü Aracı üzerinde basit bir şekilde ve herhangi bir zorluk olmadan boyayın. Chrome tarayıcı için yeni ve tamamen ücretsiz uzantımızla çevrimiçi çizim yapın. web üzerinde boya

Sayfa İşaretleyici ile farenizi veya dokunmatik ekranınızı kullanarak web'de veya PDF'lerde çizim yapabilir ve bilgisayarınıza kaydedebilirsiniz. Herhangi bir web sayfasını veya web sitesini boyayın, çizin ve işaretleyin.
